name: Platformer (Bepary Games)
description:
Bepary Games

Platformer

Game information/description

This is a basic and easy to play platform game which is similar to Super Mario. Remember your classic games and play.This is a basic and easy to play platform game which is similar to Super Mario. Remember your classic games and play. Kill all the enemies to go to the next level and finish the game. Kill all the ugly red squares and save the planet.

The game is more realistic than ever, the wind is blowing and the clouds are moving, but be careful, don't let the wind blow you away!

No more old school Windows pointers, they don't look good games, not on Platformer, but don't worry, is covered by the new pointer for Platformer!

Controls

Player 1:

  • Right arrow to go right.
  • Left arrow to go left.
  • Up arrow to jump
  • Down arrow to go down (from platforms).

Player 2:

  • D to go foward.
  • A to go backwards.
  • W to jump.
  • S to go down (from platforms).

Player 3:

  • Numpad 3 to go foward.
  • Numpad 1 to go backwards.
  • Numpad 5 to jump.
  • Numpdad 2 to go down (from platforms).

Player 4:

  • J to go foward.
  • G to go backwards.
  • Y to jump.
  • H to go down (from platforms).

Other:

  • The red squares are your enemies, go Super Mario style.
  • Escape to pause the game.
  • E to exit the game.
  • R to restart the level.
  • M to go to the main menu.

System requirements:

Windows:

  • Windows Xp or above
  • 512MB RAM
  • 128MB graphics
  • 1GHz CPU

Mac OS X:

  • Mac OS X 10.6 Snow Leopard
  • 512MB RAM
  • 128MB graphics

Ubuntu:

  • Ubuntu 14 or above
  • OpenGL-capable graphics card with valid driver
  • 512MB RAM
  • 128MB graphics

Note: this game runs only on Windows but you can use Wine to use this game on other platforms.
